source_caption_data.pre_caption:
This is a scenery shot of the upper portion of a grand, historic building, likely a cathedral or palace, set against a brilliant blue sky. The architecture is intricate, with large, weathered domes, white marble spires adorned with statues, and detailed carvings. One of the domes is noticeably covered in scaffolding, indicating restoration is underway.

The camera performs a slow zoom and slight upward tilt, focusing on the elaborate details of the roofline and domes.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Their movements are captured in a time-lapse style, creating a dynamic and rhythmic visual effect. Their dynamic movements create a rhythmic visual effect, while a street performer in the center juggles brightly colored balls, captivating several onlookers.
